QuestData.Title: Gather the Orbs
QuestData.Description: The Razaani ethereals have strange devices that emit small, pink floating light orbs. They remind me of souls.$B$BThey are not to be confused with the large yellow balls that break free of the ethereal when they die, these are something else entirely.$B$BI'd like for you to head north to Razaan's Landing and drop some totems, which will attract the pink light orbs.$B$BBring them back to me so that I might determine exactly what they are.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Orb Collecting Totem to collect 15 Razaani Light Orbs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected all of the Razaani Light Orbs that are needed?
QuestData.RewardText: Something does not feel right.$B$BPlease, $N, hand me the totem. I must examine those orbs!
